titles.title: Scriptural readings for the Night Hours / Rәʾәyä täʾamәr, Vision of St. John the Evangelist about the Miracles of Mary / Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Scriptural readings for the Night Hours (fols. 5ra-9ra) I-1) 5th Hour (fols. 5ra-6ra) I-2) 6th Hour (fols. 6ra-8rb) I-3) 9th Hour (fols. 8rb-9ra) II) Rәʾәyä täʾamәr, Vision of St. John the Evangelist about the Miracles of Mary (fols. 9ra-24vb) III) Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year (fols. 24vb-116ra) III-1) Scriptural readings for liturgical periods, fasts and feasts (for the entire year) (fols. 24vb-81va; 111rb-116ra) - Liturgical period Yoḥannәs: fols. 24vb-26va - Liturgical period Fәre: fols. 26va-27vb - Liturgical period Mäsqäl: fols. 27vb-29va - Liturgical period Ṣәge: fols. 29va-30vb - Liturgical period Mäḍäw: fols. 30vb-32ra - Liturgical period ʾAstämḥәro: fols. 32ra-33va - Liturgical period Sәbkät: fols. 33va-35vb - Liturgical period Bәrhan: fols. 35vb-36rb - Liturgical period Nolawi: fol. 36rb-vb - Liturgical period Lәdät: fols. 36vb-38rb - Feast of the Epiphany (Ṭәmqәt): fols. 38rb-39va - Vigil of a feast (Wazema): fols. 39va-41rb - Feast of Mary (bäʿalä Maryam): fols. 41rb-43va - Feast of the Son (bäʿalu Wäld, sic): fols. 43va-44ra - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fol. 44ra-rb - Feast of Simeon, Presentation of the Lord (Lәdätä Sәmʿon): fol. 44rb-vb - 8th Sunday before Easter, Sunday of “He who descended…” (zä-wärädä) or “of the Encounter with the Fast” (Qäbbäla ṣom): fols. 44vb-46va - 7th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Holy” (Qәddәst): fols. 46va-48ra - 6th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Temple” (Mәkwәrab): fols. 48ra-49rb - 5th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Paralytic” (Mäḍagwәʿ): fols. 49rb-50va - 4th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Mount of Olives” (Däbrä Zayt): fols. 50va-53rb - 3rd Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Good Servant” (Gәbәr ḫer): fols. 53rb-56ra - Palm Sunday (Hosaʿәna): fols. 56ra-57va - Resurrection (Tәnśaʾe): fols. 57va-60rb - Liturgical period of the Resurrection (zä-zämäna Tәnśaʾe): fols. 60rb-62rb - Ascension (ʿƎrgät): fols. 62rb-63va - Pentecost (Ṗaraqliṭos): fols. 63va-65rb - Fast of the Apostles (Ḥawaryat): fols. 65rb-67rb - Liturgical period Kәrämt (“Rainy season”): fols. 67rb-69ra - Feast of the Trinity (Śәllase): fols. 69ra-70vb - Transfiguration (Däbrä Tabor): fols. 70vb-72rb - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fols. 72rb-72ara - Feasts of the Righteous Ones and Martyrs (Ṣadәqan wä-Sämaʿtat): fols. 72ara-74va - Feats of Angels (Mälaʾәkt): fols. 74va-76vb - Daily readings (zä-wätr): fols. 76vb-77vb - Sundays (sänabәt): fols. 77vb-79rb - Fast of Nineveh (Nänäwi): fol. 79rb-va - Feast of the Mountain of Zion (Ṣәyon): fols. 79va-80ra - Feast of the Wedding of Cana (Qana zä-Gälila): fol. 80ra-va - Feast of the Upbringing (Ḥәnḍät): fols. 80va-81va - Liturgical period of the Revelation (zä-zämänä ʾAstärʾәyo): fols. 111rb-112vb - Feast of Melchizedek (Mälkä Ṣәdәq): fols. 112vb-115ra - For the Mass (Qәddase): fols. 115ra-116ra III-2) Scriptural readings for the days of the week (fols. 81va-111rb) - Monday (sänuy): fols. 81va-84ra; 95ra-96vb - Tuesday (śälus): fols. 84ra-85rb; 96vb-98rb - Wednesday (räbuʿ): fols. 85rb-87ra; 98rb-100rb - Thursday (ḥamus): fols. 87ra-89ra - Friday (ʾarb): fols. 89ra-91ra; 100rb-101vb - Saturday (qädamit): fols. 91ra-92va; 101vb-111rb - Sunday (ʾǝḥud): fols. 92va-95ra
Additio 1; colophon.

copyists.copyist: Colophon mentions haläqa Täqwamä Wärq as the scribe, but the hand is different from that of the text.

donors.donor: Additi 2 mentions mämre Gәdäy or Gәdädäy [sic for Gәdäy?], as well as his wife Wälättä Yoḥannәs and their son Gäbrä Ṣadәq.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: triple line fillet, double line fillet, single line fillet, double circle, zig-zag, double sine wave with dots).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

txfolios.txfolio: Foliation mistake: fol. 72a is not foliated.

squires.squire: A(4/fols. 1r-4v) – I(8/fols. 5r-12v) – ፪II(8/fols. 13r-20v) – ፫III(8; s.l. 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 21r-28v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 29r-36v) – ፭V(8/fols. 37r-44v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 45r-52v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 53r-60v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 61r-68v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 69r-75v) – ፲X(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 76r-83v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 84r-91v) – ፲፪XII(8/fols. 92r-99v) – ፲፫XIII(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 100r-107v) – ፲፬XIV(8/fols. 108r-115v) – XV(6/fols. 116r-121v).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors in supplication formulas; incipit of Text I and its sections; first two lines of Text II and its sections; first two lines of Text III-1; first two lines of Text III-2; titles of books to be read; directives to the ministers such as qәdmä wängel; the word barәkännä, “bless us” in Text I-2 (fols. 7va-8rb); abbreviation of the directives yәbәl kahәn, “the priest says”, yәbәl diyaqon, “the deacon says” and yәbәl ḥәzb, “the people say” in Text III-2 (fol. 83ra); elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals. On the incipit page of Texts I and III-1 (fols. 5r, 24vb) a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ይካ፡ for ይብል፡ ካህን፡ ይዲ፡ for ይብል፡ ዲያቆን፡ ይሕ፡ for ይብል፡ ሕዝብ፡

otherdetails.otherdetail: Text III is called Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw in the conclusive formula and in the donation note (s. Additiones 1-2); cp. Mss. DMD-012 and SDGM-007.

colophon.det: Written in big, very fine script, in the middle of the folio, in a hand different from the main one. Haläqa Täqwamä Wärq is indicated as the scribe; his brother haläqa Gәrmay is also mentioned.

additional.cont: Fol. 116: Donation note.
additional.det: Written in red ink. Names of the donors, mämre Gәdädäy [sic for Gǝdäy?], his wife Wälättä Yoḥannәs and their son Gäbrä Ṣadәq, are mentioned. The date, 1934 A.M. (=1941/42 A.D.), and the church that received the Ms., Maryam Siʿet (here Siʾet), are also mentioned.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Decorated quire marks written in the upper margins of the first folio of the quire.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Notes written in the upper margin, in frames, indicate readings for Text III on fols.: ዘዮሐንስ: fol. 24vb ዘፍሬ: fol. 26va ዘመስቀል: fol. 27vb ዘጽጌ [sic]: fol. 29va ዘመጸው: fol. 30vb ዘአስተምሕሮ: fol. 32ra ዘስብከት: fol. 33va ዘብርሃን: fol. 35vb ዘኖላዊ: fol. 36rb ዘልደት: fol. 36vb ዘጥምቀት: fol. 38rb ዘዋዜማ: fol. 39va ዘበዓለ፡ ማርያም: fol. 41rb ዘበዓሉ፡ ወልድ: fol. 43va ዘግዝረት: fol. 44ra ዘልደተ፡ ስምዖን: fol. 44rb ዘወረደ: fol. 44vb ዘቅድስት: fol. 46va ዘምኵራብ: fol. 48ra ዘመጻጉዕ [sic]: fol. 49rb ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት: fol. 50va ዘገብር፡ ኄር: fol. 53rb ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 56ra ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 57va ዘዘመና፡ ትንሣኤ: fol. 60rb ዘዕርገት: fol. 62rb ዘጳራቅሊጦስ: fol. 63va ዘሐዋርት: fol. 65rb ዘክረምት: fol. 67rb ዘሥላሴ: fol. 69ra ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር: fol. 70vb ዘግዝረት: fol. 72rb ዘጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት: fol. 72ara ዘመላእክት: fol. 74va ዘዘወትር: fol. 76vb ዘሰናብት: fol. 77vb ዘነነዊ: fol. 79rb ዘጽዮን: fol. 79va ዘቃና፡ ዘገሊላ: fol. 80ra ዘሕንጸታ: fol. 80va ዘሰኑይ: fols. 81va; 95ra ዘሠሉስ: fols. 84ra; 96vb ዘረቡዕ: fols. 85rb; 98rb ዘሐሙስ: fol. 87ra ዘአርብ: fols. 89ra ; 100rb ዘቀዳም: fols. 91ra ; 101vb ዘእኁድ: fol. 92va ዘዘመነ፡ አስተርእዮ: fol. 111rb ዘመልከ፡ ጼዴቅ: fol. 112vb ዘቅዳሴ: fols. 115ra
